name: Fruit Slicer 2
description:
Goal: Try to slice as many fruits as you can before dying.

Controls: Move with the arrow keys or the A & D keys. Slice by clicking with the left mouse button.

Upgrades: You can go to the store and buy upgrades with coins. You get coins by slicing them as they fall down.

Hearts: Lastly, hearts will fall down from the sky too. If you slice it, then it will heal a heart for you.

Note: Playing in fullscreen mode is highly recommended.

Link to game on Unity Play:  Fruit Slicer 2 - UnityPlay
